turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Hawaiian pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And do you have a Three Meat Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it's called the Macho man.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh, that sounds good. Let's get that, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 2 small pizzas, one hawaiian and one macho man.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have some extra cheese on the Macho Man?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: After adding extra cheese your total comes out to $26.88 okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Let's do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your pizza will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope it's good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Me, too. Thanks a lot. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, take care.
